page.title: 02Uyeasound Kirk.
page.content: The Kirk was built in 1850 but shows 1843 above the door.The reason for this is that in 1843,John Ingram of Unst dismissed the General Assembly Meeting of the Church of Scotland because he disagreed with how Ministers were chosen.He and 200 others walked out and set up the United Free Church.In 1929 the United Free Church became a unit of the Church of Scotland. Rumour has it that the Kirk was built with a grant from the Duchess of Sutherland. The current Minister has been the Minister for this and St.John's Kirk in Baltasound since 1982.The weekly service in Uyeasound is held at 12.30 p.m. on Sunday.The building seats 400 but the average attendance at Sunday worship is 20.
